reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Country Programme 200287 Support to community management of moderate acute malnutrition
Country Programme 200287 Support to community management of moderate acute malnutrition

description.narrative: Mit diesem Projekt wird das Welternährungsprogramm mangelernährte Kinder zwischen 6 Monaten bis 12 Jahren sowie schwangere bzw. stillende Frauen unterstützen. Darüber hinaus erhalten die begünstigten Familien weitere Angebote, um die Ursachen der Mangelernährung nachhaltig zu beseitigen, u.a. Schulungen zu gesunder Ernährung, Hygiene und Kindergesundheit, sowie Food for Asset Angebote.

With this project, the World Food Programme will support malnourished children between 6 months and 12 years of age as well as pregnant and breastfeeding women. In addition, the beneficiary families receive further offers to sustainably eliminate the causes of malnutrition, including training in healthy nutrition, hygiene and children's health, as well as food for asset offers.

With this project, the World Food Programme will support malnourished children between 6 months and 12 years of age as well as pregnant and breastfeeding women. In addition, the beneficiary families receive further offers to sustainably eliminate the causes of malnutrition, including training in healthy nutrition, hygiene and children's health, as well as food for asset offers.
